ayahs.text: [{"word_arabic":"يُبَصَّرُونَهُمْ","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":73394,"word_number_in_surah":43,"word_translation":"They will be made to see each other","word_transliteration":"yubassarunahum"},{"word_arabic":"يَوَدُّ","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":73395,"word_number_in_surah":44,"word_translation":"Would wish","word_transliteration":"yawaddu"},{"word_arabic":"الْمُجْرِمُ","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":73396,"word_number_in_surah":45,"word_translation":"the criminal","word_transliteration":"al-muj'rimu"},{"word_arabic":"لَوْ","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":73397,"word_number_in_surah":46,"word_translation":"if","word_transliteration":"law"},{"word_arabic":"يَفْتَدِي","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":73398,"word_number_in_surah":47,"word_translation":"he (could be) ransomed","word_transliteration":"yaftadi"},{"word_arabic":"مِنْ","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":6,"word_number_in_quran":73399,"word_number_in_surah":48,"word_translation":"from","word_transliteration":"min"},{"word_arabic":"عَذَابِ","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":7,"word_number_in_quran":73400,"word_number_in_surah":49,"word_translation":"(the) punishment","word_transliteration":"adhabi"},{"word_arabic":"يَوْمِئِذٍ","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":8,"word_number_in_quran":73401,"word_number_in_surah":50,"word_translation":"(of) that Day","word_transliteration":"yawmi-idhin"},{"word_arabic":"بِبَنِيهِ","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":9,"word_number_in_quran":73402,"word_number_in_surah":51,"word_translation":"by his children","word_transliteration":"bibanihi"}]

[{"word_arabic":"كَلَّا","word_ayah":15,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":73414,"word_number_in_surah":63,"word_translation":"By no means!","word_transliteration":"kalla"},{"word_arabic":"إِنَّهَا","word_ayah":15,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":73415,"word_number_in_surah":64,"word_translation":"Indeed it (is)","word_transliteration":"innaha"},{"word_arabic":"لَظَى","word_ayah":15,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":73416,"word_number_in_surah":65,"word_translation":"surely a Flame of Hell","word_transliteration":"laza"}]
